p.seg: STATEMENT OF THE AUDITOR OF PUBLIC ACCOUNTS OF THE State of Nebraska SHOWING THE APPROPRIATIONS MADE AND MONEYS EXPENDED BY THE FORTY-THIRD SESSION OF THE LEGISLATURE Convened January 6 and Adjourned April 1, 1925 Legislative Expenditures Shown up to April 30, 1925.
